title: Manage Casting Call Submissions
description: A casting director needs to review thousands of actor submissions for a new role and narrow them down to a shortlist.

tasks.description: Filter all submissions based on the role's requirements (e.g., age range, gender, specific skills).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent filters over 5,000 submissions down to 200 that meet the basic criteria.

tasks.description: Review the headshots and resumes of the filtered candidates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the materials for the 200 candidates.

tasks.description: Create a shortlist of the top 20 candidates and schedule them for an audition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a shortlist and sends out audition invitations.
